title: Luke Showcases a Soma Fab Square Taper Bottom Bracket Tool
content:
Wouldn’t it be nice not to have to wonder what your square taper bottom bracket spindle length should be? We agree. In the latest Soma Fab video, Luke profiles a tool that Jim from Soma developed that helps you figure out the optimal chainline without needing to buy a bunch of bottom brackets, or have a cache of them laying around. Give this a watch and then let Luke know in the comments if you’d be interested in this tool!

The post Luke Showcases a Soma Fab Square Taper Bottom Bracket Tool appeared first on The Radavist.
author: John Watson
